The paragraph does not mention any disease. The MTD (Maximum Tolerated Dose) is a term used in clinical trials to describe the highest dose of a drug or treatment that does not cause unacceptable side effects. Carbetocin is a drug used to prevent excessive bleeding after childbirth, and the MTD is calculated for this drug, but no disease is mentioned.
